title: Assassin’s Creed Japan & MORE Leaked - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.07.22
description:
Greg is joined by Jeff Gertsmann to talk about Assassin's Creed leaks, new Xbox and PlayStation updates, and Splatoon 3 reviews!

Follow Jeff: https://twitter.com/jeffgerstmann

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping

KFFL has been put on hold until September 9th! Too many of y'all signed up (thank you!). Andy had a hell of a time organizing and getting all of the players together and we'd love to have the show later this week but Blessing has to host something or whatever so Monday is the day! Also if you signed up and haven’t responded to your Twitch whispers, GET ON IT!

The Roper Report  -

00:07:51 - Ubisoft is about to announce several new Assassin’s Creed games
00:18:04 - Speaking of Ubisoft: Tencent increases investment in Ubisoft
00:31:08 - Ad
00:33:189 - Xbox Elite 2 controllers will be customizable in the Xbox Design Lab later this year
00:41:03 - Splatoon 3 review round up
00:45:53 - Nintendo announces a new Pokémon Scarlet and Violet-flavored Switch OLED
00:51:22 - Gio’s joining Iron Galaxy!
00:55:06 - Out today
00:57:06 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
